thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Ted Dewar, Burnaby, BC
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by Ted Dewar, Burnaby, BC

author: Ted Dewar, Burnaby, BC
title: Ted Dewar, Burnaby, BC
text: Even though my wife says that I am useless in front of a computer, I was able to search for the flights we needed and was able to find appropriate flights that matched our travel plans quite quickly and easily. I would definitely use Flight Hub the next time I am planning any travel.
